subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Joey Logano slipped past Mark Martin in the closing laps at Pocono Raceway for his first victory since 2009 to become the first Sprint Cup driver this season to win from the pole.
snippet: Joey Logano slipped past Mark Martin in the closing laps at Pocono Raceway for his first victory since 2009 to become the first Sprint Cup driver this season to win from the pole.
